Bootstrap 4 Password Strength Meter Example - Status

jQuery(document).ready(function () {
    "use strict";
    var options = {};
    options.ui = {
        container: "#pwd-container",
        showStatus: true,
        showProgressBar: false,
        viewports: {
            verdict: ".pwstrength_viewport_verdict"
        }
    };
    $(':password').pwstrength(options);
});
